We are looking for smart, passionate team players who can help us improve the state of healthcare by tackling some of the most complex data science and machine learning challenges in the industry. Weâ€™re currently seeking a Senior MLOps Engineer to join our Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) team.Â 

Â

The MLOps team designs, develops, deploys, monitors, and assures the continuous operation of the athenahealth cloud-based platform supporting Machine Learning Algorithms.Â We strive for operational excellence, results-oriented and creative problem-solving, and a passion for helping our team-mates succeed.Â

  • Ensure our cloud-based ML training and serving platforms are available and performant, and that we can proactively identify problems

  • Build tools to improve speed, confidence and availability of our platform

  • Help build security into every step of the software & infrastructure development life cycle

  • Collaborate across multiple technical functions to ensure high availability, disaster recovery, and customer satisfaction.

  • Strong hands-on experience in Kubernetes designing, creating, deploying, and maintaining enterprise-class ML models and services

  • Experience in Data Science or working with Data Scientists as stakeholders

  • Experience with model training pipelines using Kubeflow.

  • Experience deploying and maintaining Linux-based, highly scalable, and fault-tolerant enterprise-class software platforms.

  • Demonstrated experience with object oriented programming in Python.

  • Hands-on experience with any of the following technologies:Â  Spark; Istio/service mesh architecture; cloud security; Terraform/CloudFormation

  • Hands-on experience with developing microservices in a Public Cloud environment such as Amazonâ€™s AWS Services, Azure, or GCP.

  • Familiarity with common monitoring, log aggregation and metrics gathering platforms such as Grafana, Prometheus, and CloudWatch

  • Engineering experience with databases such as Snowflake, Postgres, MySQL, Redis, DynamoDB, etc.

  • Familiarity with common configuration management & orchestration tools such as Jenkins, Puppet/Bottlerocket, and Chef.

Our vibrant and talentedâ€¯employees â€” orÂ athenistas, as we call ourselves â€” spark the innovation and passion needed to accomplishÂ our goal.
